name: VOID (itch) (Kevin Varghese [Abstractlines])
description:
VOID is a bit-style Sci-Fi/Thriller RPG


Download it here for FREE!

TIPS:

- ESC if your Sanity drops and affects gameplay.

-> Restart from a different save point,
sanity is important!

- F5 for Fullscreen / F6 for Windowed

- F12 for Title Screen

- Controls In-Game


- Play alone, in the dark, and with headphones!

- Try to get the best ending and escape the void.

- Find all the secrets/easter eggs.

- Any issues? Ideas? Strong objections?
Contact me.
